info.name: CODATA Fundamental Physical Constants
info.description:
This experimental API provides access in machine actionable formats to information on Fundamental Physical Constants. This includes the constants names, values & uncertainty (including changes over time), units, unique identifiers.

The core information has been collected from the [U.S. National Institute of Technology (NIST)](https://physics.nist.gov/cuu/Constants/) website.

This project is taking place under the the umbrella of [CODATA Digital Representation of Units of Measurement (DRUM)](https://codata.org/initiatives/task-groups/drum/) task group.

Note that the API is work in progress, and should only be used for evaluation, development, or educational purposes.

For more information or to feedback/contribute, please visit the project on GitHub at [https://github.com/codata/drum-constants](https://github.com/codata/drum-constants)

query.description: Search constant values by name. This parameter is a regular expression macth on the English name of the latest version
The search result page. Defaults to 1.
The maximum number of macthes per page. Default iis 10.

request.description: Returns an object with search results statistics and information on constants mathing search criteria

response.name: Search constants whose name contains 'alpha'
